## The Dashbboard Project

This dashboard is powered by the **MapAgora** datasets, which are derived from IRS tax returns of tax-exempt organizations and data scraped from their websites. The goal is to map civic infrastructure across the United States.

- **Developed and maintained by**:  
  [Jae Yeon Kim](https://jaeyk.github.io/) and [Milan de Vries](https://snfagora.jhu.edu/person/milan-de-vries/)
